message.content:
cs.CE, cs.MS, cs.NA, cs.DC, cs.SC

Reasoning: The paper presents a framework for solving hyperbolic partial differential equations (PDEs) on GPUs, which is a topic related to computational science and numerical analysis. Therefore, cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) and cs.MS (Mathematical Software) are the most likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper discusses optimizations to minimize access to global memory, which is a topic related to computer architecture and parallel computing, suggesting that cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) are also possible sub-categories. Finally, the paper presents a practical implementation of the framework, which could be of interest to researchers in scientific computing, suggesting that cs.SC (Scientific Computing) is a possible sub-category as well.
